alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 11 at 3:30PM CDT until further notice by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Minnesota... St. Louis River At Scanlon affecting Carlton and South St. Louis zone. .Warm temperatures are rapidly melting snowpack increasing river flows. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...St. Louis River At Scanlon. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.5 feet, Minor flooding occurs near Scanlon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 4.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri St. Louis River Scanlon 10.5 4.5 Tue 2 pm CDT 6.0 7.8 9.0 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon by 330 PM CDT.
